title: Bates Stamp Documents for Production
description: A paralegal needs to apply unique Bates stamp numbers to a set of documents before producing them in discovery.

tasks.description: Select the set of documents to be produced.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the final production set.

tasks.description: Configure the Bates stamp format (e.g., prefix 'ABC', starting number '000001').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly sets up the numbering scheme.

tasks.description: Apply the Bates stamp to the bottom right corner of every page of every document in the production set.
tasks.expected_outcome: All pages are uniquely and sequentially numbered.
